Text: Wow, I haven't seen this in a while. I actually have it on VHS. Thanks!

Apparantly the aliens were not so nasty and mean as depicted in the movie. Plus they had clothes on and their craft was not as messy. This is a 90s movie with classic scary abduction scenes. But they do not match the original story.

It's more like he gets zapped with static from the craft and they patch him back up. Before giving him a nice tour and dumping him back home.

I like alien encounter stories. But even if true and in a best case scenario, they are just vitness testimony. Five feathers quickly becomes five chickens...
